app.title: MCP Interactive Feedback System
app.subtitle: AI Assistant Interactive Feedback Platform
app.clickToCopySessionId: Click to copy full session ID
app.updateFailed: Failed to update content, please manually refresh the page to view new AI work summary

feedback.title: Provide Feedback
feedback.description: Please provide your feedback on the AI assistant's work. You can enter text feedback and upload related images.
feedback.detailedPlaceholder:
Please enter your feedback here...

Tips:
• Press Ctrl+Enter/Cmd+Enter (numpad supported) for quick submit
• Press Ctrl+I/Cmd+I to focus input box
• Press Ctrl+V/Cmd+V to paste clipboard images directly
feedback.imageUploadText:
Click to select images or drag and drop images here
Supports PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF, BMP, WebP formats
feedback.dragdrop: Drag and drop images here or click to upload

shortcuts.submit: Ctrl+Enter to submit (Cmd+Enter on Mac, numpad supported)
shortcuts.paste: Ctrl+V to paste images (Cmd+V on Mac)

feedback.submittedWaiting: Feedback submitted, waiting for next MCP call...
feedback.alreadySubmitted: Feedback already submitted, please wait for next MCP call
feedback.connectingMessage: WebSocket connecting, feedback will be submitted automatically when connection is ready...
feedback.invalidState: Current state does not allow submission

summary.title: AI Work Summary
summary.description: Below is the work summary completed by the AI assistant. Please review carefully and provide your feedback.
summary.placeholder: AI work summary will be displayed here...

commands.title: Command Execution
commands.description: Execute commands here to verify results or collect more information. Commands will be executed in the project directory.
commands.notConnected: WebSocket not connected, cannot execute command

settings.title: Settings
settings.layoutModeDesc: Select how AI summary and feedback input are displayed
settings.combinedVerticalDesc: AI summary on top, feedback input below, suitable for standard screens
settings.combinedHorizontalDesc: AI summary on left, feedback input on right, suitable for widescreen displays
settings.autoCloseDesc: Automatically close page after submitting feedback
settings.resetDesc: Clear all saved settings and restore to default state
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? This will clear all saved preferences.
settings.resetSuccess: Settings have been reset to default values

session.timeout: Session has timed out, interface will close automatically
session.timeoutDescription: Due to prolonged inactivity, the session has timed out. The interface will automatically close in 3 seconds.

sessionManagement.title: Session Management
sessionManagement.description: Manage current and historical session records, view session statistics.

management.title: Session History Management
management.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all session history?
management.description: Manage locally stored session history records, including retention period settings and data export functionality
management.exportDescription: Export or clear locally stored session history records

userMessages.title: User Message Recording
userMessages.description: Control whether to record user submitted feedback messages in session history

privacyDescription.full: Record complete message content and image information
privacyDescription.basic: Only record message length, image count and other statistics
privacyDescription.disabled: Do not record any user message content

userMessages.confirmClearAll: Are you sure you want to clear all user message records from all sessions? This action cannot be undone.

connectionMonitor.maxReconnectReached: WebSocket connection failed, please refresh the page to retry

dynamic.aiSummary:
Test Web UI Functionality

🎯 **Test Items:**
- Web UI server startup and operation
- WebSocket real-time communication
- Feedback submission functionality
- Image upload and preview
- Command execution functionality
- Smart Ctrl+V image pasting
- Multi-language interface functionality

**Test Steps:**
1. Test image upload (drag-drop, file selection, clipboard)
2. Press Ctrl+V in text box to test smart pasting
3. Try switching languages (Traditional Chinese/Simplified Chinese/English)
4. Test command execution functionality
5. Submit feedback and images

Please test these features and provide feedback!
dynamic.terminalWelcome:
Welcome to Interactive Feedback Terminal
========================================
Project Directory: {sessionId}
Enter commands and press Enter or click Execute button
Supported commands: ls, dir, pwd, cat, type, etc.

$

management.title: Prompt Templates Management
management.description: Manage your frequently used prompt templates for quick selection during feedback input
management.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this prompt?
management.emptyHint: Click the 'Add New Prompt' button above to create your first prompt template

buttons.noPrompts: No prompt templates available, please add one in settings first

modal.emptyFields: Please fill in all required fields

about.title: About
about.contactDescription: For technical support, issue reports, or feature suggestions, please contact us through Discord community or GitHub Issues.
about.thanksText:
Thanks to the original author Fábio Ferreira (@fabiomlferreira) for creating the original interactive-feedback-mcp project.

This enhanced version is developed and maintained by Minidoracat, greatly expanding the project functionality with Web UI interface, image support, multi-language capabilities, and many other improvements.

Special thanks to sanshao85's mcp-feedback-collector project for UI design inspiration.

Open source collaboration makes technology better!

settings.title: Image Settings
settings.sizeLimitDesc: Set the maximum file size limit for uploaded images
settings.base64DetailHelp: When enabled, includes full Base64 image data in text, improving compatibility with certain AI models

images.sizeLimitExceededAdvice: Consider compressing the image with editing software before uploading, or adjust the image size limit settings.

autoSubmit.title: Auto Timed Submit
autoSubmit.enableDesc: When enabled, automatically submit selected prompt content after specified time
autoSubmit.timeoutDesc: Set countdown time for auto submit, range: 1-86400 seconds
autoSubmit.promptDesc: Select prompt content for auto submission

notification.title: Audio Notification Settings
notification.description: Configure audio notifications for session updates
notification.enabledDesc: Play audio notifications when there are new session updates
notification.noCustomAudios: No custom audio files uploaded yet
notification.audioNameHint: Leave empty to use default filename
notification.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete audio "{name}"?
